record.dc:title: 238GP22, 15GP22, Greenup County, Kentucky. Hardin Village. Feature 66, Remnants of Aborginal Floor.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Photo of remnants of prepared aboriginal floor in house "M" Feature 66. Stakes in background indicate postholes. Feature 66: Several "islands" of puddled clay, packed flat and smooth, in occupational stratum. Top is worked off smooth. Texture is hard, shows some indication of fire action, but not as intense firing. Texture similar to that of pueblo floors made of clay mixed with urine.
record.wpa:comments: More information, including diagram, available at institution. For House "M" see also Photos 252, 253, 257, 259GP22.
